verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thank You for saving me, what can I say? You are my everything, I will sing Your praise. You shed Your blood for me, what can I say? You took my sin and shame, A sinner called by name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mercy and grace are mine, forgiven is my sin. Jesus my only hope, the Savior of the world. “Great is the Lord,” we cry, “God, let Your kingdom come.” Your word has let me see, Thank You for saving me.{/lang-eng}
